post.summary: Save or update blood test data
post.description: Saves a new blood test data or updates existing one based on the is_update flag.

is_update.description: Flag to check if data should be updated. True for update, false for save new.

id.description: ID of the blood test to update. Required if is_update is true.

submit_date.description: Submission date of the blood test.

return_date.description: Return date for the blood test.

start_time.description: Start time for the blood test.

end_time.description: End time for the blood test.

data.description: ID of the saved/updated blood test data.

get.description: Fetches a list of blood test records based on search and sorting criteria. Returns paginated results.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Filter the results based on passport number, full name, or batch number

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Specify the column name for sorting

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Specify the order of sorting (asc or desc)

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of results per page

get.description: Fetches a list of blood tests based on provided filters. Returns paginated results or sorted results based on the month of the test date.

parameters.name: batch_no
parameters.description: Filter the results based on batch number

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: Filter the results based on test month in the format 'MM-YYYY'

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of results per page

post.summary: Delete a specific blood test record
post.description: Deletes a blood test record identified by its ID. Also deletes associated blood_applicant data if present.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the blood test record to be deleted

id.description: ID of the deleted blood test

message.description: Unexpected error during the delete operation

post.description: Save or update blood applicants details. If 'is_update' is true, it will update an existing applicant otherwise a new blood applicant record will be created. Pass is_update = 1 when updating the record.

id.description: ID of the saved/updated blood applicant

parameters.description: Batch number to filter the results

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Optional search string to filter applicants

post.description: Renew the appointment date and remarks for the given blood applicant.

parameters.description: ID of the blood applicant to renew appointment for

post.summary: Add penalty to a blood applicant
post.description: Adds a penalty fee and remarks for the given blood applicant.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the blood applicant to add penalty for

post.description: This endpoint sends a blood applicants report based on provided applicant IDs.

post.summary: Save or Update a PLMS Company
post.description: This can either create a new PLMS Company or update an existing one based on the input parameters.Pass is_update = 1 when updating the record. While is_update = 1 id field is required.

400.description: Bad request. User has sent an invalid request.
